header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 000: Clause 5, page 2, line 31, at end insert—
“( ) An order made under subsection (2) shall not have authority in Scotland unless a draft has previously been approved by the Scottish Parliament.”
000: Clause 5, page 2, line 32, at end insert—
“( ) This Act extends to England, Wales and Northern Ireland.”
